name: MI445 Project 1
description:
• Added fences to denote invisible walls.
  • Added spear pickup, which increases the equipment level and deals much more damage against boss during his second stage.
    • Deals massive damage in first state, because spears hurt (and I don't want to change the damage calculations).
  • Added projectile/shockwave based damage system.
  • Added arena for the second stage of the boss fight.
  • Added animations for boss during his second stage.
    • 6 animated attacks in total.

Created by Ryan Chang
